metadata.title: gstreamer1-plugins-good: integer underflow in FOURCC_strf parsing leading to OOB-read (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The CVE program describes this issue as: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handling components. An integer underflow has been detected in qtdemux_parse_trak function within qtdemux.c. During the strf parsing case, the subtraction size -= 40 can lead to a negative integer overflow if it is less than 40. If this happens, the subsequent call to gst_buffer_fill will invoke memcpy with a large tocopy size, resulting in an OOB-read. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.24.10.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
gstreamer1-plugins-good is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
